meanings.definition: The soft, fleshy lower part of the external ear.
meanings.sent1: Her earlobes were ticklish when touched.
meanings.sent2: She wore beautiful earrings that dangled from her earlobes.
meanings.sent3: The kitten playfully batted at her earlobes while she napped.
meanings.sent4: His voice was so loud, it felt like it could reach her earlobes.
meanings.sent5: The cold wind made her earlobes tingle with frostbite.

meanings.definition: The part of the earlobe that is pierced for earrings.
meanings.sent1: She carefully cleaned her earlobes after getting new piercings.
meanings.sent2: His earlobes were adorned with multiple studs and hoops.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to sneak a peek at her hidden earlobes.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter rang out, causing her earlobes to jingle with the earrings.
meanings.sent5: The weight of the heavy earrings pulled on her earlobes throughout the day.
